instruction: Come up with some creative ways to recycle cardboard.
output:
1. Use cardboard as a fire starter when camping. 
2. Create storage boxes and shelves out of cardboard. 
3. Use cardboard to make decorative plant holders. 
4. Turn cardboard boxes into hand puppets or dolls. 
5. Use cardboard to make wall art or a photo frame. 
6. Use cardboard to make personalized coasters. 
7. Use cardboard to make a personalized birdhouse. 
8. Use cardboard to create gift boxes or gift bags. 
9. Use cardboard to make animal bedding or a pet house. 
10. Line the bottom of planters with cardboard to help with drainage and soil erosion.
